content.detailedDescription: my fieance and i went to my best friends funnurel,when i got back i sat on the swing in the back yard looking up talking to the sky to my best friend and out of the blue sky came a obigect of light and it stoped right above the tree line by entergy our power plant that i worked at it started glowing and pulsating and the one ball became three and left as fast as thay arived one went strait up and the other two left at about a 65 degree angle.My girlfriend said she came out side and called me for supper but i did not come.I do not remember her and the door is about 15 to 20 feet away from the swing and i did not go anywere.It seemed like one mineit,but it was dark when i went in side.All i know is ther is nothing that can go that fast it was amazing. i was 21 or 22 at the time.It has realy made me think differantly about aliens and ufo's
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: One terned in to three and was gone in two sec or less

content.detailedDescription:
I opened my back door and i seen a bright huge light raying upwards..I ran and got my boyfriend who was sleeping. we both examed it for a while then i got my camera i took some pictures, the light would not show up but there are some things you can see. i also took a video. my son started crying as soon as i went to get him my boyfriend said it shut off..I wanted to catch it on film but he said it turned off light a tv screen. today 6/16/08 i went out to the feild with my mom and sisters and aunts to see if it left anything and there is circles of grass lieing down in the feild. so many days have past it is popping back up but u can still see the circles.
id rather talk to someone before i give photos..
content.summary: Bright light shining upwards

content.detailedDescription: I have been taking pictures of what i thought were satellites in the sky.   some of these probably were satellites, however one day my mother and i were outside and something in the sky was tumbling and turning.  i took photos
content.summary: I have taken several pictures on different dates of various shaped objects,  one of which is clearly a disc shaped object.

content.detailedDescription: It was a sundy in mid-september 1999, although i can't recall exactly which one, but i was driving on a frontage road, facing west, right around willow rd. and maybe patriot blvd. can't recall exactly. i stopped at an intersection for a red light, i was the only one there since it was a weekend and i was leaving an industrial park where practically nobody was working that day. it was a sunny day, with high, white clouds moving fairly quickly through the sky,and as i sat at the light i noticed a large passenger plane flying towards my direction in the distance, preparing to land at o'hare airport, which was a few miles behind me. the clouds opened behind the plane to reveal a huge, metallic/mirrored sphere, at least it looked like a sphere, altough i could only see about what appeared to be about 75% of it because of the clouds. the plane was flying towards me, right in front of the object, and comparing the sizes, i figured that the object was at least fifteen times the size of the plane from my view (meaning, you could have stacked fifteen planes on top of each other in order to reach the height of the sphere), but it was certainly a good distance behind the plane, well out over the lake, so it was probably much bigger than that. it was in my view for about fifteen seconds(i do remember actually counting when i saw it)and then quickly moving clouds slid in front of it and blocked my view. i never saw it again. i remember feeling pretty shook-up after seeing that thing.
content.summary: Huge sphere with metallic/mirrored panels all over it.

content.detailedDescription: i was relaxing at the [lakefront] beach, looking out at the water and the sky, when i did see today- 3 air force fighter jets chasing a silver globe-shaped object, over spanaway lake, at approximately 4:20pm this afternoon, when i was at the beach on spanaway lake, in spanaway park. i didn't see much, just enough to convince me that i saw something indubitably out of the ordinary- a silver disc almost squat-globe-shaped and roughly [from my viewpoint] the perceived size of a bb at arm's length- at an altitude roughly similar to jet fighters after they have started to ascend to their operating altitude [i am no good at judging distance, this is strictly an analagous estimation, i would say the altitude was in between that of a piper cub flying locally, and that of a passenger jet headed for the airport.  i hope that made sense to you]- this object was discernably bisected on the horizontal plane, almost like a silver wedding band placed horizontally around the midsection of a flattened chromed steel ball.  its airspeed was also similar to a passenger get on approach to an airport.  it made no sound i could hear, at least not above the sound of car/boat traffic and wind and the masses of people frolicking at the beach, none of whom seemed to notice what was happening in the sky above them.  i noticed this object out of my peripheral vision and watched it move in an easterly direction about 10 degrees from when i first noticed it [fist-width estimation] before i then noticed some very noisy [the jet-fighters turned on something which made them roar thunderously] air force jet fighters in a trio, chase after this object for about  15-20 seconds before the object simply disappeared- at this point it did not discernably go up or down, it just disappeared from sight.  the trio of jet fighters just flew threw the airspace where the object had been, and they flew approx. a mile past [the boundary of the lake] before they turned around [rightward] sequentially, the innermost plane closest to me turned first, followed by the others in a widening arc as through searching for something- they flew in concentric circles back where they came from [to my left], in approx. a 2-3 mile arc before going back towards [mcchord afb] base.  this is the first time i have ever seen anything like this object, in the flesh [so-to-speak].  it happened too quickly for me to even think about recording it. [expletive!]
content.summary: I saw a silver globe-shaped object in the sky get chased by 3 jet fighter planes over spanaway lake, washington.

content.detailedDescription:
I am submitting higher resolution images of the strange blurry light that appeared on my fathers scout camera.  i merged the previous images together side by side and reduced their size which did lower their original resolution.  i was only allowed to uplaod three images, and i wanted to show all three night shots plus the day photo.  i apologize as it did effect the resolution and made the images more pixelated. the camera's resolution was not set on high res, but the quality of these attached images is better.

someone questioned if these were altered.  they were not.  my father doesn't have a computer and brings me the sd disk to clean off all the images that are uninteresting. of the 700 images that were captured in three days, most are of crows, squirrels and leaves moving.  once in a while we get a nice buck, wolf, or some other large mammal.  that's been the purpose of this camera. it was never the intention to capture unexplanable lights.

i will admit i am a professional graphic artist and do know how to use photoshop very well.  i even teach it at the local college.  but that was not the case with these.  i did take the images and played with filters, brightness, etc, to see if i could get anything else to appear, but other than circular glows in a horizontal blurry motion, i got nothing.  these attached pictures are just as they came off the sd card from the scout camer.  

i submitted them to this sight not to say we captured a ufo, but to get some possible explanations of what it could be other than a ghost or spaceship from beyond.  if this wasn't on my father's camera i would be making the same suggestions that it's not real and was altered.  i am skeptical of spirits and ufos, and have never seen one personally to convince me otherwise. but there are many stories that can't be explained and i doubt they are all liars.  

i have tried to come up with what this light could be. i showed it to other photographer friends and no one has come up with a reasonable explanation.  someone suggested a bug, but it stays too horizontal in all three shots.  i first thought a drop of water on the lens, but it changes size and locations.  the third shot is the strangest as you can see a tree in the distance in the middle of the lights.  that tree is fifty yards away from the camera.  why is that portion of the image lighter?

each shot was aprox, 10-15 seconds apart. there were no shots directly before or after these for another hour.  as i explained previously, the raccoon in the shot most likely set off the camera, not the light source.  the motion sensor only picks up a 25 ft range.  the raccoon came and went as fast as the light, otherwise the animal would have kept setting the camera off taking more shots.  the previous night there were over fifty pictures of that critter - but no lights.

my best explanition is the camera digitally did something i can't explain.  while i thank those who do come up with some thoughts of what this could be, i know for a fact these pictures were not digitally altered.
content.summary: Better pictures from scout camera - southern vermont

content.detailedDescription:
I was camping on the edge of a sesonal lake bed,( skookum lake ),last thursday with a friend. it was the first evening of several days of rock hunting. we had finished a late bbq dinner 1-2 hrs after dark, aprox 10:30. while i was readying an air mattress and bedding in the open bed of my pickup,  my friend was watching the night sky and talking of seeing a couple of shooting stars and seeing what she called jets manuevering. i recall hearing sounds of jets but really wasn't looking or paying attention. at one point her voice got a little excited, saying,"look over there", pointing in a northwesterly direction. by the time i did, i didn't see anything. she simply said it was an odd light. this happened once or twice more within a few minutes without me seeing anything. i'm not sure of the next exact sequence, but i finally looked after her urging and saw a single light flash on, i can only describe it as, if you make a circle, cut it in half vertically and exsagerate it a little bigger, like a side view of an old style auto headlamp. just the headlamp off, not illuminated. i witnessed this once or twice then saw two, one next to each other. these flashed on for aprox 1-2 seconds. i don't recall hearing jet sounds in relation to the lights but once observed lights and noise i'd associate with an airplane(jet?)start on the n/w horizon go straight up to a 10 or 11 o'clock position make almost a u turn and head back to about the same spot close to where we saw one of the first half circle lights. i know i saw a single light at least twice, then the double set twice in different positions moving in our north sky from west to east. as a final look we both obseved two sets of two of these half circled type light flashes. i don't remember if it was then or not,(the final burst), but at some point when i saw them, i remember thinking i'd seen these same type(shaped)lights on some program on ufo's i've watched before. i still don't know which one it was but yesterday i decided they reminded me of the sightings in arizona some years back. the way those lights appeared when they first lit up, one after another. for what i saw,all the activity was over a span no more than ten-twenty minutes. my companion felt what we saw were military type manuevers with unconventional aircraft and although niether of us has any background or expertice in aircraft or military i agree with her. i forgot to mention my freind said that a little while after the final observance of four lights, that what she called a jet shot from where the four were to overhead, and gone in the southern sky. i wasn't aware of it i suppose i was in a state of semi shock. that is why i'm a little unsure of exact sequences.
   i want to say that i have spent many,many nights sleeping in the openair in the high desert over the past thirty plus years and have never seen any thing i didn't think was probably easily explainable, nothing! i also am and have been extremily curious of the subject of ufo's but for the lack of undisputible evidence am not sure of any extraterestial connection. i adamantly believe in thier probable, not possible exsistence given the size of our solar system and beyond. i also would not in the least be surprised in thier known exsistence by the,"powers that be", simply because of these power's covert nature. 
   based on my limited knowledge and observance i would never on my own, say what i saw was extraterestial, but it was to me, literally an unidentified flying object. did anyone else see anything on that date in the pacific northwest ?
   one note, we did spend the next night at the same campsite and did not see anything. naturally i was armed and ready with my camera then.    
                       thanks,
                           rick
content.summary: Witnessed lights flash on single, in two's and finally two two,s.

content.detailedDescription: Vermont scout pictures appear to have been altered. if you enlarge picture #3 you can see where another picture has been inserted. in the insert one can see a vertical tube like structure with two "legs" (just to the left of the raccoon). this "structure" isn't in the day shot but it appears in all of the night pictures and it remains the same size in all three pictures..So, it's doubted this is some alien object approaching the camera. the 3rd night picture when enlarged clearly shows a square edged insert whose color does not match the rest of the picture.
content.summary: Vermont scout camera pictures appear altered

content.detailedDescription:
Bright light over berthoud 3 nights now. i took some pictures from the foothills looking southeast over berthoud. is this a bright star? there seems to be angles to it when you enlarge the pictures. if you look closely at some of the many pictures i have taken the past 3 nights, there appears to be blue dots that are aligned to form cubes/elongated cubes/circles etc. right behind the "star".

i just would like to know if it is indeed a bright star.

thanks so much.
content.summary: 6/13-6/15/08 bright light over berthoud, co 80513

content.detailedDescription:
In the early 1970's in the hills of pacific palisades, ca. on anoka drive. i was watching tv in jim lecron family room, the family room has a large glass window that gives you a view of the malibu coast line-west to santa monica-south, it is common to see lots of airplanes taking off from lax and santa monica airport and helicopters flying up and down the malibu coast with their red & green nav. lights and flashing strobe, so we all knew what airplanes & helicopters look like at night, that evening jim's mother noticed unusual very bright colorful lights coming down the malibu coastline towards us, there was a telescope that sat by the large family room window and a pair of binoculars. all of us took turns trading off between the telescope and binoculars, what i saw was a multi colored (white, blue, red, yellow, green) constant bright lights randomly flickering around the sides of a thick disc shape, i tried focusing on the inner portion non lighted top area, but only saw black, it was night time and dark out, the sun was completely set with no clouds, fog or moon light, this object came down the malibu coastline towards pacific palisades and hovered about 200 feet in the air about 500-800 yards from the shore of topanga beach, malibu/charthouse restraunt, from our view, we were looking down on the ufo at an angle, it hovered there silently for a few of minutes, then abruptly went into the water, even with the naked eye you could see the greenish illuminating glow from the craft being under the water, it stayed there under the water for a few minutes not moving at all, when i looked at it through the telescope i could see the pattern of waves going over the lighted sea water, at that moment his mom freaked out screaming and started calling the police and air force in a panic. i watched the craft come out of the water and hover, in a hover as i was watching it through the telescope, the craft elongated to about 2 times its length, i couldn't tell if it turned a quarter turn and it was always longer and we were looking at it from the front, or if it actually changed its whole length & size wich it appeared to do, the same bright multi colored lights were still coming from the sides, as i told jim he grabbed the telescope from me, i was looking at the ufo with my naked eye for about 20 seconds after it elongated when it, in a split second, shot off at incredible speed from a stand still, it just streaked south towards catalina island. i tried to rationalize it and thought i might have been some kind of secret military craft but it was not, it came in slow, it hovered, went under the water and then shot away very very fast, since then i have flown helicopters and fixed wing aircraft and to this day there isn't anything that could even remotely function or look like that, i know what we experianced was probibly the most incredible thing i will ever see in my lifetime and i remember it vividly. 
if anyone else has experienced this event i have seen in that same time period or if there are any pictures or reports, please contact me!
sincerely,
robert snyder
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multi colored ufo came down malibu coastline at night, hovered, went into the ocean, i could see ufo lights under water, came out into a hover, shot off fast towards catilina island

content.detailedDescription: (330pmish still daylight out)well we were getting back on the highway my buddy and i heading north to nh and on a long on ramp curve was a cigar shape - plane with no wings no tail just sitting above a cloud not moving or anything the only cloud in the sky so it was hard not to see, because it was longer than the cloud, and it was silver - chrome in color and sitting above a farm of some sort mabey it was a dairy farm not sure, like two mins later it shot off heading north and left a glow streak, like a shooting star leaves and thats it in nov 97,
content.summary: I wrote a detailed one

content.detailedDescription:
I live in a luxury hi-rise apartment in midtown, next to the empire state building. 

at around 4:40am i got up while my roommate was about to sleep and went to the rooftop for a cigarette.

at around 4:45 or so, i noticed a dark blimp or oval shaped vehicle, which i first thought was a blimp but then realized there was no cabin, no indication of rudders or fans, no markings or logos and absolutely no lights.

it appeared to move without wobbling or without any influence of the wind direction, but rather in a stable path over or near the east river from about the union square east area (14th street) to the 34th street area, disappearing from my field of view on the east side of the empire state building, then reappearing on the north side. this is where it changed course and turned east and quickly ascended until it reached the cloud level and disappeared. 

it was my intent to record this event with my cameraphone which i had in hand but i was too stunned to even remember to switch it on. i tried recording the event after it oriented itself easterly, but realized then it was too late for my cameraphone to record it with any quality. 

i tried sleeping it off and thought i was going insane for a minute but then realized that i had just simply seen an aircraft that didn't conform to the normal standards of flying objects in the nyc area (i.E., lights, engine noise, tags or markings identifying the craft, etc.) i checked for reports of any sightings or anything out of the ordinary anonymously. i would contact the nypd or airports to inquire about any other reports, but i'm afraid reporting it to authorities in this city would cause ridicule and alarm. please let me know if you are in nyc area and saw a blimp like object in the early hours of june 14, 2008.
content.summary: Silent, non-marked, dark grey/black blimp like vehicle moving north east over east river in a straight line then orienting east ascending to cloud altitude and into cloud in double the time

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the roof of my house and making a call to my home. when i just given a glance to the sky, suddenly some unusual things are moving together and only a 'chain ' of lights (around 40) moving very fast in a floating manner. the light is like handing some what 3 u shapes in a slight slanting position. the size of the light chain is too long from the first sight itself i felt that something unusual. a plane cannot be that much size and there was no sound and can not be that kind of shape and it was too fast. i stopped calling my parents and tried to take photos using my mobile but it came out blank and noting is clear. the same time i called my friend, but before he reaches because of the city light on the sky make it not clear because it was moving to the direction where the city light is too falling to the sky. immediately i put this in my blog
http://meninweb.Blogspot.Com/2008/06/ufo-again-in-bangalore.Html

pretty sure, i am one of the lucky one to see an unusual object, is it a ufo ?? i feel so. still when i close my eyes, its comes into my mind.!!
content.summary: Around 40 -50 lights objects moving in a combined way.

content.detailedDescription: I was returning from indianapolis travelling norhtwest after picking up my mother and nephew from the airport. riding along with me were another nephew and a niece. as we were travelling, i noticed a big bright strobe light off the southwest side of inerstate 74. i(44)jokingly remarked to the kids in the back seat, "look it's a ufo". well the next thing i know my mother (76) is saying look, look, look! and coming from my left and passing about 50 feet above and in front of us was a disc about 20-30 feet in diameter with rectangular windows(portholes?). it continued on it's banking path and proceeded to fly in a southwesterly direction along the interstate. the kids, ages 10-13 all saw it and were a little scared and in awe!!! had i been alone i would have stopped but since i had the kids with me i kept going. then about five minutes later, again on the southwesterly side of i-74, we saw a reddish glow coming from a field, the kids say they saw something on the ground but since i was driving i did not see it and again i couldn't stop to investigate because of the kids. i have travelled that road countless times at night and i have never seen any of the lights i have mentioned here, not to mention the craft. all in all it was a pretty exciting night for all involved. it's all the kids can talk about and i am glad that they had the oppurtunity (myself as well) to witness such an event. i have attached a drawing i created using autocad inventor and converted to a pdf file of what we saw.
content.summary: Driving nw on i-74 saw a light to my left, said light then flew over in front of me and off to the right rear.

content.detailedDescription:
My father brings me his sd card from his scout camera that he posts around his property to see what kind of animals he can capture.  within a three day pariod it took over 700 pictures which is not unusual.  about 50% are night shots which tend to capture racoons, foxes, coy-dogs, and deer.  days shots are of turkeys, crows, squirrels, etc.  

as i was scanning through the pictures i noticed a series of three pictures that had some strange lights we couldn't explain.  keep in mind this camera is set up at the end of a field where there is no electric and headlights wouldn't reach.  the camera is set to take three shots when it picks up motion.  you will notice a racoon in each shot which most likely set off the detector.  

if the light in each shot was in the same position and same location, i would would suggest it was something on the lens, or a reflection of something, even though all that is down there is trees.  but the light moves in each of the three shots as if it is getting closer to the camera and has a unusual pattern of blurry sphere-like lights.  of the 700 shots the camera took in three days, these were the only night shots that had these lights.   the lights in the last of the three shots seem transparent as you can see the tree through them.

i attached the three photos with the lights and one day shot to show what the area looks like.  the camera was not moved or touched during three days. i don't want to say it's a ufo, but no one here has explained what the lights are.
content.summary: Horizontal sphere lights move closer to scout camera.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside near my pool working on my tan. naturally i occasionally looked up at the sky and it just so happens that i noticed a unusual object, solid black in color, that appeared to be "wobbling" as it moved. the object was slighly oval and because of its apparent altitude and black color not much detail was visible even though it was broad daylight (12:40 in the afternoon). its flight path was a straight line, in a south-easterly direction, but it seemed to sway, ever so slightly, from side to side. i watched for a about a minute or two as is crossed the entire sky, starting from directly overhead, and then watched as it dissappeared in some distant clouds. there was no audible sound that i am aware of. 

my first thought was... "hmm... that was weird. i wonder what that was? a ufo??" i kind of laughed to myself and not giving it much more thought i continued to lay there in the sun, still working on my tan, but keeping an eye on the distant clounds just in case the object returned to view. 

and that's when things really got weird. about 1 minute after the object dissappeared into the distant clouds, 5 identical objects (perhaps one of them was the original?? this i am not certain) emerged from the same clouds and began circling around. all of them fit the same description: solid black and slightly oval. from my vantage point, they were moving in "tight" circles and appeared to be moving upwards, almost in a spiral pattern. they were not all circling the same direction either. atleast 1 of them was circling the opposite direction of the rest. 

at this point i jumped to my feet and called to my nephew, who was swimming, to look at what i was seeing. he stopped swimming and watched with me, for approximately 2 or 3 minutes, as these black objects continued circling around each other, all in close proximity to the same original clouds. 

finally, all but one of the objects dissappeared back into the clounds and the last object made one final circle and then proceeded in a straight line heading east, with the same "wobbly" motion as the first. the interesting thing is that the last object, that was heading east, actually turned at an angle that caused it to reflect sunlight for a brief moment so i know it had to be a metallic aircraft of some sort (or atleast something capable of reflecting sunlight). 

as far as what it actually was... i have no idea!! at the time, i remember thinking "wow... i am witnessing some ufos" so i actually looked at my cell phone (which i had nearby) and made a mental note of the time. ive also been thinking about it for a couple days now and it was intriguing enough that i wished i had a video camera... so i went and bought one, just in case im lucky enough to see a similar event again!
content.summary: 5 ufos seen circling about and then dissappear into clouds

content.detailedDescription: On may 8th. at 1:30 pm 13.3 miles into mt rainier state park in a road pull out we 6 - 8 people saw two disc shaped objects over a hilltop in mt rainier state park i was only able to take one picture before the two objects shot straight up threw the clouds and puff they were gone. i know these objects was not from this world and after that day it has changed our lives . i now beleave we are not alone. ufo northwest took my picture and ran it threw the mill found it to be a genien ufo they posted the picture on there web site so did coast to coast am . i hope ya'll can help me to understand maybe what is going on around here i looked into the recent history of reports from this area and there has been several reports with the same disc type objects in this area .
content.summary: Two bright blue lit disc

content.detailedDescription: Hey i live in north carolina,outside charlotte, and today i saw my first ufo....I was wondering if anyone had seen this event or heard anything about it? all my life i have always wanted to see something like this and today was the day. i was on my way back from picking up some chineese and about to make a keft into a harris tetter shopping center when i noticed other people ahead of me in the turning lane pointing up at the sky and when i looked up i saw...I can't belive what i saw... it was about 6:30p.M. and there wasn't a cloud any where near this giant wobling highly reflective disc....With what looked like a lighter dot in the middle of it. myself and a few other people pulled over in the parking lot and all got out of our cars and were speachless. the only point of size reference that we had was a cessna that looked to be about 3 miles to the left in the sky away from it, and the object was pretty hughe in comparison to it and traveling very arratic and fast. it started wobbling end to end (right to left) and then went horizontal in the sky but on a vertical angle and then start to move away very quickly in a diagnoal line upwards and it either sped up so fast we couldnt see it any more or just went invisible almost and disapeard. i stood there for another half an hour and didn't see anything else go by other than that cessna and like a putz i am standing there trying to call my fiancee at home(literally 2 mins. from were i was) and forgot that i had a razor camera phone until i got home and called my friend in new york to tell him and he said,"if you had a camera phone(8mega pixel w/zoom) why didn't you try and take a picture rather than call anyone?" and i couldn't belive i had been so excited that i totally forgot. i just wanted to call home and get my fiancee to confirm what i was seeing...That and ,"oh my god!!!", was all that was running through my head. well thats my story and iam sticking to it and damn proud of it
content.summary: I was driving home from getting dinner and was about to turn into parking lot of super market near my home when i noticed people looking up a something in sky....A  highly reflective silvery disc

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to walk the dogs for the last time, and noticed a bright light in the southern sky (toward macdill afb) it is a cloudy night, so there were no stars present. at first it appeared to be a star, but as we looked at it more closely, we could see a clear separation point making it two distinct lights. they are still there as i type this. 11:27 p.M. they are described by my daughter as orange/white in color. they appear to be completely motionless other than a slight "fading" action, or pulsating. okay, 11:31 p.M. and they are now gone! i got out the seldom used video camera, and of course the battery is dead, so we tried with a camera phone, but i don't think we got anything. as far as the shape, it was two triangles right next to each other. the one on the left was standing on it's point, while the one on the right was sitting on it's base. when i say triangle, i mean pyramid shaped. my first reaction was "that's an airplane" as we are right under the flight path for tia, but that was soon discarded as it didn't move a bit. now, as i tried to reason with myself, i thought maybe it is going away from me, or coming towards me, but it stayed at the same altitude, didn't get any brighter, dimmer, or smaller or bigger. it stayed exactly the same for as long as i could see it. about a half an hour. as far as losing sight of it, i was typing this report and looked up to check on it and it was just plain gone. i am curious if anyone else reports this! if i wasn't sure of what i saw, i sure as hell wouldn't take the time to type this up. help!
content.summary: Two triangle shaped lights, one upside down, one right side up, next to each other, motionless.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were camping at sylvan lake, it was a tuesday night, approx 2215.  we were in the campground that faces the lake. we were facing approx. se.  the campfire was in front of us.  i can't remember if there was a moon or not, but there were no clouds at all in the sky.  we both were looking at the sky and i noticed a bright, white and round shape getting brighter and brighter, about a hand width above the mountains and about the size of a marble (distance perspective). all of sudden it flashed brightly and disappeared.  i turned to my husband and said, "did you see that?"  he said, "uh huh." and nodded his head. we weren't scared as for there were other campers in the vicinity. we just thought it was a great experience.

*i just learned about mufon very recently and i had no idea how to research our experience.  i have looked on the web and have found nothing.  thank you very much.
content.summary: Bright flash of light

content.detailedDescription: So it all started while standing in the montclair plaza mall parking lot. it was pretty late and we were hanging out talking. i was standing, facing east and a friend i was talking to was facing west. halfway through a sentence he yells "sh--! look!" and points to the western sky behind me. i whip around to see a reddish orange fireball around the size of a full moon sailing across the sky in a 4 o'clock direction, and disappear behind the jc penney building. i really can't tell how far away this was, but it made no sound. it had the appearance of a meteorite coming down, but the only thing that makes me question it is the sheer magnitude of it. later on the same morning, i had a meeting at work, and come to find out, one of my coworkers had also seen it from pomona (7-8 miles west of montclair) and said it was far off in the western sky and gave a perfect description of it to me before i had told him any of the details about it first. the hairs on my neck rose right about then... please feel free to drop me a line if you have seen this event or have any information. my email is daniel_remillard@yahoo.Com
content.summary: Mystery fireball over so. cal

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my car at mmtc, a local college here, facing south. i had just purchased a video camera and was trying it out. i was filming towards the east. i only recorded about 2 min. of video. it was a clear sky. no wind at all. i didn't notice the object while i was filming. when i got home i downloaded the video and previewed it on windows media player. at around time stamp 1:42 i noticed an object, at the left bottom part of the film, right above the tree line, fly by really fast. slowed it down and noticed it was a large object. even in slow motion it traveled really fast on the video.I then tried to capture frame shots of it, still had a hard time because of the speed of the object, but i managed to get a couple. i enhanced them the best i could but...  below are the pics and video of the object. i don't know if it was a "ufo", but it traveled very fast and i know of no craft that we have that does that. please view and let me know what you think.   thanks.  "keeping my eyes to the sky"
content.summary: Object going really fast

content.detailedDescription: Stopped on the side of the road to take a picture of a barn and some corn took 2 pictures came back to the house to unload onto the computer and saw it, the night before i also, around 9:30 10:00 p.M. i saw one in the western sky it look like a backwards meteor it was bright and fade out quick going up into the sky.
content.summary: Took two picture less then 2 sec apart one picture had a ufo in it

content.detailedDescription:
I'd gone out into the garden to smoke a cigarette and as i sat down i saw the moon behind my neighbour's house, illuminating some clouds. i got up and walked to the side gate to get a better view. looking through the gate i noticed a light out of the corner of my eye, so i turned my head to look at it. it was a bright, ruby-red light that was hovering in the air, some distance away towards the south.
i wondered what it could be when it began slowly moving to the right, still at the same altitude. after a second or two of movement, it stopped and began hovering again. a few seconds later it moved to the left, back to roughly where it originally was. it stopped again and hovered once more. my heart rate had increased by this time and i felt excited and slightly worried. it didn't move anymore after that, but stayed perfectly still. it seemed to gently fade for a moment, then return to it's full brightness, as though a cloud was moving in front of it. it did this a couple of times. from what i could see of the sky, it was a very clear night but there was a scattering of low-lying clouds. 
after a minute of waiting to see if it would go anywhere or do something else, i rushed inside and upstairs to get my camera. i came back down again approximately 1 minute later and hurried outside to where i was standing before. the light was still there in the same position, only this time it was noticeably fainter. i attempted to film it but my camera couldn't pick it up as it was getting fainter all the time. it steadily got fainter and fainter until it disappeared entirely. 
from the time of first seeing it to it's disappearance, roughly 5 minutes had elapsed. how long it was there before i saw it i don't know - i don't think it just suddenly appeared as i was looking at the moon.
from the time of coming outside with my camera to the time of it's disappearance, roughly 1 minute elapsed, with it steadily growing fainter and not "pulsing" as described earlier.
i waited around for a while but it didn't return. throughout this whole episode, several dogs were barking in the village, however my cats didn't seem perturbed at all. shortly (minutes) after it disappeared, the dogs stopped barking.
i had initially wondered if it could have been a flare, as it was in the direction of an artillery range a few miles away, but during the whole episode there was no deviation in height, and no flickering, smoke-trails or "auras" usually associated with flares.

picture attached was taken the following afternoon from where i viewed the ufo.
content.summary: Hovering red light, moving left and right then fading away

content.detailedDescription: Traveling west on the i-10 just north of palm springs witnessed a very bright blu-green ball of light which seemed to be just above san jacinto mountain which borders palm springs, shortly after there was a bright white light  maybe an impact really cannot say.  continued to travel west on the i-10 west while looking up the san jacinto mountain from its nw side there seemed to be a plume did not notice any clouds in the area, my boyfriend phoned kesq-news and spoke to someone that confirmed something to the same sighting over the scanner, please check this out.
content.summary: Blu-green ball

content.detailedDescription:
First, i would like to explain that these 5 craft did not travel all together. second, these were not military nor civilian aircraft. there were no blinking lights, they defied the laws of physics, and they glowed -- in that the light seemed to emanate from within them than without - and were brighter than any star in the sky. 

all the craft were spherical. they seemed to mimic stars in their appearance. 

the first two craft traveled parallel to each other and in formation. they seemed to come from the low northeast, banked south, then headed northwest. 

the third sphere seemed to come from the north and moved in zig-zags. it also moved northwest, in the same general direction as the first two. this single sphere seemed to pause (from our pov) in the head of the constellation draco for at least 3 seconds before continuing its flight.

 the last pair (totalling five spheres), also came from the northeast and in formation, traveled south. at one point in this pair's flight, one of the spheres paused in the sky (it did not move) while the other seemed to catch up to it. the movements and flight of these spheres was very fluid, as if they were traveling through water. they were, for lack of a better description, swimming in the sky. 

at times all five sphere���s  light wavered into different colours, but with a soft transition between red and silver light. they did not blink. their light was constant. there was a total lack of sound. they also seemed to be flying outside of our atmosphere but not as far away as the moon. all five objects seemed to be following a definite flight pattern - but we must stress that the movements were soft - like watching swimmers. slow. lazy.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 5 spherical objects

content.detailedDescription: Took my dog out for the last time of the night,it was about 12:15 am june 15. a bright reddish-orange light was in the sky where there is usually no light . i live approx. 1 mile form hoosier park horse racing track,the object seemed to be about 2-3 miles from me in the direction of middletown,indiana which would have put the object close to interstate 69. i watched for about 10 minutes before getting my sony camcorder the object hovered in place for about 30 minutes of which i have video not very good but 30 minutes worth.The object seemed to rotate and shift color along its axis.The object had a top, middle and bottom which appeared to change color sometimes blue to white to orange and pulsing.Although the object moved it was very slowly, always staying over the same area.At times it appeared to have a brighter light come from out from it like a spotlight.In the video a small aircraft can be seen flying just under the object,the planes navigation lights clearly visible and flashing.My son came out and watched for about 10 minutes with me.During which time he saw the object change color and pulse. there was no sound from the object.And it was gone in a second no flash just gone.Some of the video is shaky but also some good steady footage.The shape was oval but cylindrical hard to really tell because it was so bright and pulsing.This was no aircraft coming straight at me then turning ,was not a helicopter nor a blimp or balloon. this object stayed on station like there was purpose and left when the objective was completed.It made me feel as if being watched.The approach to indianpolis international air port is in the other direction-from the northeast to southwest and the anderson airport approach is from northwest to souhteast but a good 5 miles north of my location.The area of sky observed normally has no  air traffic this time of night and no bright stars ever seen in this part of the sky here.At this time i need to convert the video from small dvd camera disk to a normal dvd do not know how to send you the video from my camera directly over the internet but do have 30 minutes of video
content.summary: Observed bright light southeast of anderson indiana at 12 ;30 am -1 ;00am

content.detailedDescription:
While driving eastbound on the 91 freeway just past the 242 sb exits an abnormally bright flashing light appeared nearly directly west of our
position.  we drove with our moonroof open and the sun had set fully.
there were tiny stratus clouds behind offering an orange to black contrast
to the sunset sky behind the object.
the location of it's sudden appearance seemed to quite far over the north anaheim/fullerton area in the distance. it came easterly towards the bumper to bumper 91 freeway at a fast clip. possibly as fast as 100mph. it was much swifter than a helicopter, and at the initial distance one could easily have assumed it was one. the flashing light was abnormally bright, much like the landing floods on a jetliner. as it came closer, we had the opportunity to
see it through the moonroof and it was an oblong 70-100 feet across and traveled in a sideways motion with one corner, where the absurdly bright white flashing light was and at the tail was an array of red and other colored lights. due to the rich sunset hues, i couldn't make out if the other less bright lights were green, blue or simply both. 
this sighting was very exciting simply because the entire 91 corridor was filled with families bumper to bumper enjoying the brilliant sunset all at the same time. very exciting. there should be many more reports on this coming soon.
content.summary: E/b bright flashing white light above entire 91corridor oblong w/red light array

content.detailedDescription: Went out to the backyard to have a smoke girlfriend asks me if i see strange lights on the ground thought perhaps it was the solar garden lights so i moved them then looked up in the sky and the stars were very dim because of cloud cover and one started moving it moved fast then slow left to right circles and then stop then move randomly all the wile doing one large circle around very wide but within my view six or seven times stoping and fading then moving again i got dizze watching it i didnt want to loose sight i thought it might be my eyes my girlfriend was totally scared i went back in to see if it was my eyes went back out same thing one turn to two to three to one same erratic circle around our roof tops it all the wile ther is cloud cover you could barely see them and  once or twice there would be a flash that looked like a spot light horizontal mabye three times the whole thing i just had a hard time beliving it i still dont this isnt the first time we have seen things above us pretty crazy last summer i had a daytime visual of two lights in the sky that were saucerlike one over the other was on the phone with a friend and was explaining what i was seeing and all of a sudden a dark cloud covered them out of nowere the skys were clear that day then last week saw a picture on coast to coast of the same thing over mnt rainer unbelivable what is going on ?
content.summary: Very dim very fast may have been more then one

content.detailedDescription: In early november 1973 my family was moving back to ohio. we had moved to nc the previous june and things hadn't worked out the way my family had hoped so we were moving back. i was in a hurry to get back to my friends, so i went to live with my aunt for 2 weeks. one night my cousin and i were going to take some laundry to the laundromat about 5 miles away. to get there we had to go up the hill past the high school. most of ohio is fairly flat land but where we lived had some fairly high hills due to the glaciers having ended there in the last ice age. when we crested the hill and started down the other side we noticed that it had suddenly become very dark -- much darker than normal. we looked up and noticed that something had blacked out the sky. it seemed to be very low -- much lower than cloud cover would have been. we drove on down the road a few hundred yards and suddenly it lightened up and we could see stars in the sky. for some reason we both became very frightened. we drove on to the laudromat, but when we got there we couldn't bring ourselves to get out of the car. we decided to just go home. why we would have wanted to pass through that area again i don't know. when we got closer to the dark area we could see that there was definitely something there. it was huge and dark but we could not make out the shape. but there was something different about it this time. underneath the craft there was what appeared to be a long projection of sorts with a light on the end of it and it was moving around like it was looking for something. we must have been afraid that maybe it was us they were looking for as we became even more frightened. i hit the gas and flew on up the hill out from under the thing. i've seen many other ufos, both before and after this event, but this was the only time that i ever felt fear.
content.summary: Really huge ufo
